title: How to repair Pixel 2
content:
USB port on my Pixel 2 has became 'loose'. I can still charge it, but I think it is only matter of time until it will not charge any more. There is a tiny amount of 'movement' within the USB port when you plugin cable.

I tried and failed miserably to find information on how and where to fix this.

I am in the Netherlands and have bought phone from local store. They told me I need to contact Google.

But there is no option, what-so-ever to get in contact with Google for this matter.

How to proceed?
